email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. Let me check with the owner and see if we can adjust it. Regarding laytime, it’s 72 hours total, and demurrage is $25,000 per day pro rata. I’ll get back to you shortly with a revised quote. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Revised Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, good news! The owner has agreed to lower the rate to $49.75 per metric ton. This is the best we can do given the current market. Let me know if this works for you, and we can proceed with the fixture. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. $49.75 per metric ton is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the recap, and we’ll finalize the details. Also, confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! Attached is the fixture recap for your review. The laycan remains 15-20 October, and all other terms are as discussed. Please confirm once you’ve reviewed it. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the recap looks good. Consider it confirmed. Let’s proceed with the necessary paperwork. Thanks for your help throughout this negotiation. Best, John.
